game.name: UnderParty
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: UnderParty 는 액션 플랫포머 게임 입니다. 게임의 난이도가 매우 높고, 높은 폭력성을 포함하고 있으니 주의하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: UnderParty is an Action Platformer game. This game is made up of a very high level of difficulty. It's very violent, so be careful.

reviewHighlights.text: Low effort Unity application. Zero options, forced fullscreen, no resolution settings, uncapped framerate. Extremely basic all around. Game itself is...
If possible the dev should add more content in the future, it left me wanting more Sweep Operations were fire
